text: Blood Ties () is a 1963 Soviet drama movie directed by Mikhail Yershov.Прибалтийские актёры, которых очень любили в СССРРОДНАЯ КРОВЬ It stars Yevgeny Matveev, Vija Artmane, and Tanya Doronina. == Actors == * Yevgeny Matveev as Sergeant Vladimir Feddotov * Vija Artmane as Sonya, a ferryman * Tanya Doronina * Vera Povetkina * Anatoliy Papanov * Nikolai Morozov * Andrei Danilov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1963 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Mikhail Yershov
title: Blood Ties (1963 movie)
